# SLAS {.unnumbered}

Este sitio es parte del proyecto Sustainable and Ethical Technologies for Digitally Engaged Research in the Humanities: A North-South Collaborative Lab (Part I y II) financiado por la Society for Latin American Studies, dirigido por las Dras. Joanna Crow (University of Bristol) y Patience Schell (University of Aberdeen) con la participación de la Dra. Gimena del Rio Riande (HD LAB/IIBICRIT, CONICET) y los miembros del HD LAB.
<br/>

This site is part of the project Sustainable and Ethical Technologies for Digitally Engaged Research in the Humanities: A North–South Collaborative Lab (Parts I and II), funded by the Society for Latin American Studies. The project is led by Dr Joanna Crow (University of Bristol) and Dr Patience Schell (University of Aberdeen), with the participation of Dr Gimena del Rio Riande (HD LAB / IIBICRIT, CONICET) and members of the HD LAB.
